mapper.select: SELECT u.id as id,u.context as context,u.title as title, u.icon as icon,u.status as status,u.orderId as orderId, u.createDate as createDate,u.summary as summary u.typeId as typeId,u.linkUrl as linkUrl, u.category as category,u.typeStr as typeStr, u.senderId as senderId,u.readed as readed, u.messageType as messageType,u.userId as userId, u.pictures as pictures, u.isLink as isLink,u.isMark as isMark FROM yg_sys_content u
